resources.string: Custom Maps app and its source code are published under Apache License, version 2.0.
GPS location is not available to this app. \nPlease allow this app to access GPS location to improve location accuracy.
Your location is not available to this app. \nPlease enable access to GPS or network location in system settings.
GPS location is not within map boundaries
Custom Maps failed to display the KMZ content.
Current location unknown.\nSearching for GPS signal…
The selected map could not be loaded as it was too large.
I would like to share a map with you

Many map images that can be used with Custom Maps are not drawn accurately enough to show exact GPS locations. Displayed location should be considered approximate at all times. \n\nEven within a single map some areas may be better aligned with GPS than others.

No maps found on SD card in CustomMaps folder.

Use menu to create maps and to get help finding them.

Or press 'back' to exit.
Please wait…\n\nMigrating maps to internal storage area
Use menu to create maps from photos or from downloaded map images.\n\nTap and hold a map name to modify or delete it.
Click here to visit Custom Maps web site for sample maps and a tutorial.
This map is part of a map set. It cannot be modified or deleted.
This map contains placemarks. It cannot be modified.
There are no installed apps that can share maps
Are you sure you want to delete map\n\"%s\"?
Custom Maps cannot find SD card to save map to.\nDownload canceled.
Downloading a map from the web
Please wait until the download completes or cancel download with the button below
Failed to load map image for %s.
You can redisplay this info using the menu

Select a file containing a map image.

Only use images for which you have permission.
 
Menu contains links to folders containing your photos and internet downloads.
%s is not a valid image file.\nYou must select an image file

Select a point to be located on a Google map.

Select points far apart for best results.

Avoid selecting points between previous points.
No map image selected. Can\'t select points.

Zoom and pan Google map to match the center of the thumbnail.

Use the sliders to rotate and scale the thumbnail, and to adjust its transparency.

Map button toggles map view and satellite view.
Failed to create a MapView.\nMap creation is not available.

Name your map and describe it for the map list.

Add 2-4 tiepoints to locate and scale the map image.

Adjust or delete tiepoints by long pressing the entries.

Maps can be saved after preview.
Select first a map image file.\nIt must be a PDF, JPG, PNG, or GIF file.
You must add at least 2 points before previewing

Verify the alignment of the map image by zooming and panning the map.

Back button allows you to adjust or add tiepoints.

NOTE: Some map images can not be aligned perfectly.
Failed to create a MapView.\nMap preview is not available.
Displays distance from user location to center of screen
Distance is not displayed or computed
Displays heading from user location to center of screen
Heading is not displayed or computed
Safety reminder will be shown when map is changed
Safety reminder will not be shown when map is changed

string-array.name: distance_unit_entries
string-array.item: Miles, yards, and feet (mi, yds, ft)

resources.string:
Special thanks 
• Bart Eisenberg (tutorial video) 
• Harlan Hile (pinch zoom, user location icon) 
• Patrick Steiner (internationalization, German translation) 
• Michael Ganss (German translation) 
• Francesco Terribile (Italian translation) 
• Dorin Hongu (Romanian translation) 
• Germain Zouein (testing) 
• Tomasz Kossakowski (Polish translation) 
• Dmitry Kandin (Russian translation) 
• Vladimira Šantek (Croatian translation) 
• András Hegedűs Juju (Hungarian translation)
Using 32-bit color (may limit maximum map image size).
Using 16-bit color (allows largest map image size). But app crashes on some Motorola devices.
Using GPU rendering (reduces maximum map image size).
Using software rendering (allows largest map image size). But app crashes on some LG devices.
